SummaryEnglish: The cold president, Ji Chenfeng, lost his memory because of being hit accidentally by a "village girl", Lin Moran, who later became his nominal wife. Unexpectedly, a sudden fire made them lose touch with each other. When they met again, their relationship changed from a contractual one to a romantic one. As they grew fonder of each other, they became a real couple and are passionately in love.
